role.argrole: with whom? if separate (marked by مع)

example.parse: (SBAR (PUNC ") (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (S-NOM-SBJ (VP (DET+NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_ACC التوصل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN السلام))))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM مهم) (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC جدا) (PP (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN لبنان))) (CONJ و) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN لولايات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المتحدة)))))) (PUNC "))))
